backend/main.mo: Main actor for the task management backend, handling user profiles (CRUD, role management, active user listing), task operations (create, assign, approve/reject, proof upload), and admin user management, with authorization checks via AccessControl mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Data migration module that upgrades OldTask records to NewTask by adding nullable proof submission fields (proofSubmittedBy, proofSubmittedByEmail, submissionTimestamp) and a new #pendingReview approval status variant.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (employee proof visibility, admin proof review panel, proof upload badges) to their source files, component dependencies, and test requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the frontend codebase structure and component responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH CSS custom property color tokens for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, primary, destructive, chart, and sidebar design tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Yesfour Infra Task Management app, mounting the React app at #root and loading the main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for login, profile setup, and role-specific dashboards (employee/manager/admin) under a protected layout, plus a global Sonner toaster.
frontend/src/components/DeleteUserConfir: Alert dialog component that confirms permanent deletion of a user by principal, calling the useDeleteUser mutation and showing success/error toasts on completion.
frontend/src/components/DepartmentProduc: Displays a department productivity card showing task counts by status, completion rate percentage, and total performance points aggregated from a list of tasks.
frontend/src/components/EditUserRoleModa: A dialog modal that allows changing a user's role (admin/manager/employee) by selecting a new role and saving it via the updateUserRole mutation.
frontend/src/components/GlobalTaskList.t: Renders a filterable list of tasks with search, department, status, and priority filters, optionally showing admin view and approval actions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout component providing a sticky top navigation bar with role-based nav links, branding, user info, and a logout button.
frontend/src/components/LeaderboardTable: Displays a ranked performance leaderboard table showing employee names, departments, roles, and point totals fetched per principal.
frontend/src/components/ProofPreviewModa: A dialog modal that previews task proof files (images or documents) with submission metadata, and provides a download button.
frontend/src/components/ProofReviewPanel: Displays a proof review section on a task card, showing submitter info, file thumbnail, and action buttons (preview, download, approve, reject) based on the task's current approval status.
frontend/src/components/ProofUploadButto: Renders a file upload button that accepts JPEG, PNG, or PDF files and uploads proof for a task using the uploadProof mutation, showing upload progress and toast notifications.
A dialog modal that prompts the user to enter a rejection reason and submits it via the rejectTask mutation, closing on success or showing an error toast on failure.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: Exports styled badge components for task status (StatusBadge), approval status (ApprovalStatusBadge), and a proof-uploaded indicator (ProofUploadedBadge) using color-coded configurations.
frontend/src/components/SummaryStatsCard: Renders a grid of four summary stat cards displaying total, completed, overdue, and in-progress task counts with corresponding icons and color themes.
frontend/src/components/TaskApprovalActi: Provides Approve and Reject action buttons for a task; approve calls the approveTask mutation directly while reject opens the RejectTaskModal.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Displays a task's details (title, department, priority, status, deadline countdown, description) in a card layout with optional action slots, approval/proof badges, and an expandable ProofReviewPanel.
frontend/src/components/TaskCreationForm: A form for creating new tasks with fields for title, department, assignee (via a searchable user combobox), description, deadline, and priority, submitting via the createTask mutation.
frontend/src/components/UserAccountStatu: Renders a small pill badge indicating whether a user account is Active or Inactive, styled with green or muted colors respectively.
frontend/src/components/UsersSummaryCard: Displays a 4-card summary grid showing total users, active users, total managers, and total employees derived from a list of UserStats.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Custom hook that combines Internet Identity authentication state with the caller's user profile to expose auth status, role flags, login/logout, and profile setup detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: Custom hook that takes a deadline in nanoseconds and returns a live-updating formatted countdown string along with expiry and urgency flags, refreshing every minute.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions, including user profile CRUD, task fetching/creation, and proof uploads with appropriate cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter font, configures Tailwind, and defines CSS custom properties for the corporate light/dark theme including status color utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays summary stats cards and tabbed views for overview, leaderboard, all tasks, and user management using data from admin-specific queries.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeDashboard.tsx: Displays the employee's personal dashboard with task statistics (total, completed, overdue, in-progress), performance points, and a grid of their assigned tasks with proof upload buttons where applicable.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login page with Internet Identity authentication, redirecting authenticated users to their role-appropriate dashboard or profile setup if no profile exists.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Provides a tabbed manager dashboard with sections for creating tasks, reviewing tasks pending approval, and viewing department productivity metrics.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Renders a profile setup form for new users to enter their name, email, department, and role, saving the profile to the backend and redirecting to the appropriate dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/UsersListPage.tsx: Admin page that lists all users with filtering by role and department, search, pagination, and actions to toggle account status, edit roles, or delete users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, brand/task status colors, typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing a full-stack internal task management app for Yesfour Infra, tracking architecture, existing features, known issues, and versioning metadata.
